sections.summary: The 'Turtle Trader' Engine. Donchian Channels simply plot the highest high and lowest low of the past N periods (usually 20 or 55). It is the purest form of breakout trend following. If price makes a new 20-day high, you buy. No questions asked.
sections.deep_dive: Made famous by Richard Dennis and the Turtle Traders. The logic is simple: Trends essentially consist of new highs (uptrend) or new lows (downtrend). By buying every new high, you guarantee that you will never miss a major trend.
sections.council_debate: {"geopolitics": "Trends appear when the geopolitical regime changes. Donchian Channels are the best tool for catching 'Regime Shifts'. When sanctions hit a country, its currency makes a new 55-day low. We short it immediately.", "macro": "Commodity Supercycles are captured perfectly by Donchian Channels. We don't care about 'fair value'. If Copper makes a new 55-week high, we are long. Supply constraints always show up in price first.", "quant": "The 'Whipsaw' is the killer. Win rate is only 30-40%. But the winners are 10x the losers. A pure Donchian system requires massive diversification to survive the sideways markets.", "technical": "'Box Theory'. Donchian Channels visualize the 'Darvas Box'. We look for a squeeze (narrow channel) followed by an expansion (breakout). The longer the channel has been flat, the more explosive the move.", "policy": "Central Banks try to cap yields. When 10-Year Yields break the upper Donchian Channel, the market is breaking the Fed. That is a 'Policy Error' signal.", "tech": "In Crypto, FOMO drives price. A new 20-day high in Bitcoin attracts retail floods. Donchian Channels work exceptionally well in crypto bull markets because momentum is recursive."}
sections.forecast_risks: The 'False Breakout'. In modern markets, algos hunt for stops just above the 20-day high. They trigger the breakout to trap the bulls, then reverse. You need a 'Filter' (like ADX or a Time Filter) to confirm the breakout is real.
sections.gms_conclusion: The primitive yet powerful trend tool. Brutal in chopping markets, legendary in trending ones. Use it for 'Macro' trends, not day trading.
